Digital Designer and Creative

Currently Lead UI/UX Designer for Meahe Design.

I’ve worked as a Graphic Designer for Minor Entertainment for 2 years, whilst simultaneously developing my skills as an artist.

BA Animation (Hons) helped extend my technical skills, but I’m largely self taught and constantly expanding my knowledge.

For most situations I’ll use the Adobe Suite (Premiere, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects).

For my UI/UX work I’ll use Figma, Sketch & Affinity Designer.

For any sketches I’m comfortable working on paper or Procreate.

Check out more of my work or get in touch.
